name: @peppierre/typesafe-http
author: PePPierre <peppierre@gmail.com>
description: Type-safe HTTP client libraries for Angular using various runtime type checking libraries

scripts.remove:eslint: npm run remove:eslint:rcjson && npm run remove:eslint:rcjs && npm run remove:eslint:config
scripts.pre-prepws: npm run remove:node-modules && npm run remove:dist && npm run remove:package-lock && npm run remove:eslint &&  npm run remove:npm-cache
scripts.prepws:ng16: npm run pre-prepws && node scripts/prepare-version-specific-package.js --npmTag ng16 && npm run post-prepws
scripts.prepws:ng17: npm run pre-prepws && node scripts/prepare-version-specific-package.js --npmTag ng17 && npm run post-prepws
scripts.prepws:ng18: npm run pre-prepws && node scripts/prepare-version-specific-package.js --npmTag ng18 && npm run post-prepws
scripts.prepws:ng19: npm run pre-prepws && node scripts/prepare-version-specific-package.js --npmTag ng19 && npm run post-prepws
scripts.prepws:ng20: npm run pre-prepws && node scripts/prepare-version-specific-package.js --npmTag ng20 && npm run post-prepws
